title: Beauty And The Bodyguard
overview: Nick (Randy Spears) has just lucked into the greatest job ever ... getting paid to protect a mobster boss's hot, little niece, Tyra (Jessica Jaymes). He quickly learns this "little niece" likes to have her Italian sausage delivered piping hot. She'll seduce him, and along the way, find lots of hot lesbian sex and a butt banging bonanza. It all concludes with Tyra taking a big pop in the face by her very own bodyguard.
